Name: Destroy the Demon Army - Modified
About the game: 'Destroy the Demon Army - Modified' is a numerical strategy game. Recruit and upgrade your troops and try to eliminate the demon army in the shortest time possible. This game is an overhauled version of '消灭魔王军 Destroy the demon army' . The original creators have already given consent for its production and release. Highlights: Adjustable idle speed Fast-paced rounds - only a few minutes 5 star achievement requires deep strategic thinking Leaderboard for speedrunners The second level of the game is 'My Lucky Cat'. You have a lucky cat at your home. You can cook food, buy items, and choose items for the cat to upgrade. Try to have the most gold possible. The second level has a skip function, but note that the leaderboard can only be updated 10 times within 10 minutes. The original game (first level only): /
